name: list-reports
description: List reports created by the specified account based on filtered provided.

account_id.description: The account for which the list of reports will be queried.

status.description: A comma-separated list of report status values. Reports with any of the statuses specified are returned. The values in the comma-seperated list specified for `status` can be any of `PENDING`, `PROCESSING`, `SUCCESS`, `ABORTED`, `FAILED`, `TRUNCATED`.

date_from.description: ISO-8601 extended time zone offset or ISO-8601 UTC zone offset formatted date from which the list of reports will be queried. Format `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss]±hh:mm` or `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss]Z`.

date_to.description: ISO-8601 extended time zone offset or ISO-8601 UTC zone offset formatted date until which the list of reports will be queried. Format `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss]±hh:mm` or `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.sss]Z`.

$ul: **items_count**: The number of reports in the list.
